cab.content: 2066- )JCirculated by the Secretary of State for India. secret.From Viceroy, 17th September 1917. (Received at India Office 18th. September, 10.20 a.m.)Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier quiet. Kurram. Mangals, Maidan Jajis, and Hariob Jajis lashkars have dispersed and militia special detachments are being withdrawn. No change in general military situation in India or Afghanistan. In addition to 22,000 combatant recruitsin August reported last week, 10,728 non-combatant recruits were obtained.
